offers.title: Offers
offers.empty_message: No offers available right now Please try again later!

offer_details.title: Offer Details
offer_details.cap_reached: Sorry, this game is temporarily unavailable, please come back tomorrow!
offer_details.retry_download_message: <b>Oops!</> We have trouble on validating your download. Click 'Retry Download' ' to try again. Your rewards will not be rewarded without a tracked download.
offer_details.download_intro: Follow this few steps to avoid download failure and make sure you'll get your points.

android_steps.step1: 1. Make sure you select Google Play Store to download the game.
android_steps.step2: 2. Download right away after you click "Confirm" button.
android_steps.step3: 3. After the download complete, open the game from Google Play Store.

ios_steps.step1: 1. Make sure you select <b>App Store<b/> to download the game.
ios_steps.step2: 2. Download right away after you click "Confirm" button.
ios_steps.step3: 3. After the download complete, open the game from App Store.

offer_details.download_note: Note: If the download failed, do not continue to play!

privacy_policy.title:
You're So Close To Earning
Your First Reward!
privacy_policy.subtitle:
Play Your Favorite Games!
And Earn Your Rewards!
privacy_policy.consent_info:
We hereby inform you that Tyrads Pte. Ltd. processes the following personal data within the framework of the use of TyrSDK:
Installed apps (including the use duration and use history)
The data is linked to your device via the device ID (GAID or IDFA) transmitted to our servers in encrypted form. So that app providers can finance our app suggestions, we must send them the device ID for billing purposes.

The processing of the above data is necessary to be able to recommend apps via system messages, the installation of apps available in TyrSDK that matches your interest and calculate the rewards acquired as a result of your use of the corresponding apps.

Consent

By clicking on ''Accept'' I give Tyrads Pte. Ltd my consent to process above mentioned personal data and transmit it to other apps so that i can use TyrSDK as explained.

I am aware that the above data results in an interest profile, which, depending on the type of apps I use, may contain particularly sensitive personal data (such as health data or data on my sexual orientation as well as any other data from special categories defined in Art. 9 para. 1 of the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

This data will be processed by Tyrads Pte. Ltd, TyrSDK. For more information
privacy_policy.agreement_prefix: I have read and agree to the

usage_permissions.title:
Allow TyrSDK To Track Usage Data
To Enable Your Earning Potential
usage_permissions.description: usage access allows TyrSDK to track which other apps you are using and how often, as well as your operator, language setting and other details.
